CustomField.description: CAUTION - USED IN INTEGRATIONS Automated PIN Code Entry is available on Direct (Express) level operator assisted calls. The customer is responsible for generating the list of PINs and sending the list to us. The PIN codes can be 4-9 digits in length but must all be the same length. Duplicate PIN codes are not accepted.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Select "Yes" if the client will be providing a list of APR pin codes.
CustomField.label: APR Pin Entry
